column4: I have a Sound Blaster Live! 5.1 sound card and a Logitech X-530 5.1 speaker set... the sound is okay but I got an interference noise at the central speaker all the time. Does anyone know what's happening?
Where do I can find good Linux drivers for Sound Blaster sound cards?
creative.com (but SB drivers are included with ubuntu)
Yep, the sound is working, but I got a noise on the central speaker all the time
